jcr:root.jcr:description: I’m wondering how good these shoes are for a serious trail runner. I don’t really have to worry about pronation or anything; I just need a quality pair of shoes that can take a beating.
jcr:root.jcr:title: Do you wear the Interlaken Trek shoes?
jcr:root.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

czcm-i_actually_dohavet.jcr:description: I actually do have those shoes. Drum roll…they are fantastic. Not only do they work for trail running, but they are also good when I go off the trail for a good scramble.
czcm-i_actually_dohavet.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

nhut-i_don_t_knowanythin.jcr:description: I don’t know anything about the Interlaken shoes, but my boyfriend recently got the Nairobi runners. They are listed as trail running shoes, but he uses them for it anyway and I know he really likes them a lot.
nhut-i_don_t_knowanythin.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5
